pa.text:
Configuration for https://turbowarp.org/
You can move, resize, and minimize this comment, but don't edit it by hand. This comment can be deleted to remove the stored settings.
{"width":640} // _twconfig_

mutation.proccode: smooth glide to x position: %s y position: %s size: %s direction: %s smoothness: %s
smooth glide to x position: %s y position: %s size: %s direction: %s smoothness: %s

SEQUENCE: UP UP DOWN DOWN LEFT RIGHT LEFT RIGHT

QUESTION: What can I help you with? / Reserve a room / Enter a room / No Thanks /

STRING2: is the only one left! do you want it? (Yes/No)

MESSAGE: Thanks! If you wanna enter your room, tell me '' Enter a room ''.
You already reserved a room, so do you want it for a friend or something?
It seems you haven't reserved a room yet...
Hey, see that big fireball thing in the sky? It's getting closer and closer! I'll notify you when it's about to crash here or something...
Wait! It's now here! and it doesn't seems like a good guy...
It's.... It's... That same mysterious guy who took the Happy Stone, 2 months ago!
What is this? Where did it came from?
You may fight the power of the final boss.
No noobs like you allowed, you need to have at least 50 XP Points to continue.
You Are Here - Use arrow keys to move

QUESTION: What should the Player do? (Attack | Recover)
What should the Player do? (Attack | Recover)
YOY! You have defeated the boss! (Press Enter)
